abstract: GSV, the largest of several closed-end mutual funds that offer ordinary investors a chance to own stakes in privately held companies, has been hit particularly hard by Facebook’s troubles.
snippet: GSV, the largest of several closed-end mutual funds that offer ordinary investors a chance to own stakes in privately held companies, has been hit particularly hard by Facebook’s troubles.
lead_paragraph: Few investors have ridden the recent Internet boomlet like the GSV Capital Corporation.

headline.main: GSV Capital, Placing Bets on Start-Ups, Falters
headline.print_headline: Tapping the Market for Start-Ups, a Fund Falters
